Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Streptococcus pyogenes N.Y.5 (MIC=25 µg/ml), Myotis flavus ATCC 10240 (MIC=12.5 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Corynebacterium diphtheriae P.W.8 (MIC=12.5 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activiy against Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Properties of synthetic analogs of gramicidin S containing L-serine or L-glutamic acid residue in place of L-ornithine residue.
Literature.Reference: Int J Pept Protein Res. 1996 May;47(5)369-375.
Literature.Author: Tamaki M, Akabori S, Muramatsu I.
